item.title: Docker Cli
item.author: Ohmygodzilla
item.description: Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-Level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers. Containers are isolated from one another and bundle their own software, libraries, and configuration files; they can communicate with each other through well-defined channels. Because all of the containers share the services of a single operating system kernel, they use fewer resources than virtual machines.
